usage.cn: 你嫣然的微笑是我每日享受到的魅力。
usage.eng: Your smiling at me is my daily dose of magic.

usage.cn: 成功没有快车道,幸福没有高速路。所有的成功都来自不倦的努力和奔跑;所有幸福都来自平凡的奋斗和坚持。
usage.eng: There is no fast track to success, and no highway to happiness. All success comes from tireless effort and pursuit;and all happiness comes from daily struggle and perseverance
